casebody.data:
Lloyd LANE
v.
N.C. DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS. No. 494P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, James T. Rusher, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of September 2004 by Plaintiff for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of December 2004."
